name: (8-Pack) - 4” x 4” Wooden Blocks for Crafts - 1-Inch Thick Square MDF Blocks - Smooth Surface with Wood Grain Pattern - Highly Customizable Blank Wood Squares
short_description: PERFECT SIZE 4” x 4” WOODEN BLOCKS FOR CRAFTS - These wood blocks have perfectly square edges that are 4 inches by 4 inches with 1-inch thickness. Each pack contains 8 pieces of 4x4 wood squares

HIGH-QUALITY SQUARE MDF BLOCKS - Excellent for projects all around the house or school. High-quality standard density MDF is denser, smoother, and harder than plywood. Unlike solid wood blocks, these MDF squares do not have imperfections like voids or knots

PAINT-READY SMOOTH UNFINISHED SURFACE - There’s no need for additional surface preparation. The MDF squares have smooth surfaces that accept different ‌paint and coloring mediums excellently. From enamel to watercolor, these wooden blocks will provide excellent results

WOODGRAIN PATTERN VENEER - A thin layer of solid wood with straight grain provides a smooth, near-impermeable surface perfect for painting. The strong bond between the veneer and the MDF core will allow for sanding by hand

HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE BLANK WOOD SQUARES - Create custom decor and signs by engraving, painting, or cutting the wood squares to shape. The smooth unfinished surface is also excellent for stenciling and gluing ribbons, flowers, lace, etc

product_description: This Classic Toy is a perfect first manipulative for kids! The Beginner Pattern Blocks set includes five two-sided wooden boards with 10 recessed design templates, and 30 bright and bold geometric shapes. Each template depicts a whimsical, colorful scene, and the geometric pieces are sized right for little hands to place them in their matching spaces. Kids can feel a sense of accomplishment as they complete the wooden puzzle or create their own designs and matching activities. All of the pieces come in a sturdy wooden box making clean up and storage a breeze. The Pattern Block toy provides kids with opportunities to practice color and shape recognition, fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and creative expression. Designed to engage playful preschoolers and young children, and constructed with care to withstand their harshest treatment, this block set is made of durable, child-safe materials and is safety-tested to our most rigorous standards. It makes a wonderful gift for preschoolers and kids ages two and older for hands-on, screen-free play.
